description:
Character And Charm
9 Plover Street, Cowes
This charming and character filled home has been lovingly cared for and exceptionally well maintained by the current owner.
Offering three large bedrooms serviced by a central bathroom, the light-filled and spacious home offers so much. Whether you're looking for a sea change, a holiday home, or to add to your property portfolio, you're sure to be impressed.
Entering through the front door, you are greeted by a large living room with exposed beams and stunning polished floor boards. A wood heater and split system air conditioning will keep you comfortable year-round.
The functional kitchen and meals area boasts an LG Solardom convection oven and timber laminate bench tops. Alfresco dining on the decked entertaining area will be a pleasure in the warmer months.
All three bedrooms are robed, while the large master bedroom has plenty of space and new quality carpet.
With a fully enclosed rear yard and a huge shed that can function as a garage, workshop, or storage for the boat and other toys; a real bonus for those needing secure off street parking.
In close proximity to all that Cowes has to offer, including beaches, cafes, supermarkets and nature parks, including the world famous penguin parade, this home is a must see.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Due to government guidelines if you reside in Metropolitan Melbourne or Mitchell Shire, you will be unable to attend open homes of this property. If you would like to arrange a private or virtual inspection for the property, please contact the Agent.

Overlooking the Golf Course!
Located directly across from the Phillip Island Golf Course and taking in the lovely greenery aspect, this fabulous property is sure to impress you.
This outstanding home boasts style and spacious living zones combined with modern finishes to create this fantastic family living experience.
A vast open-plan area unites the household together with the lounge room, dining room and kitchen appointed with dishwasher and central island bench for relaxed social gatherings. This space flows effortlessly onto the outdoor entertainment deck overlooking the lovely low maintenance surrounds.
The master bedroom is spacious, with walk-in-robe and ensuite whilst the remaining two rooms are a great size with built-in robes.
The master bedroom and front living area has stunning views overlooking the Golf Course.
Additional features include a double garage, laundry, reverse cycle split system in the main living zone and tiles throughout.
This residence is also situated within close proximity to the shops, schools, cafes and pristine North facing Silverleaves beach.
All of this is set within a generous 601sqm approx allotment and currently has a great tenancy in place. Inspections are by private appointment.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Make this your home or holiday at Beautiful Phillip Island
This lovely 2 storey family home features 4 bedrooms & is ideally located in Cowes within 5 mins walk to the beach, Primary school & shops.
Entertaining is a breeze with open plan upstairs living, kitchen & dining flowing easily onto the outdoor balcony. The master bedroom is also located upstairs complete with semi-ensuite, walk through into walk-in robe & separate toilet. Downstairs 3 more bedrooms with BIR's, bathroom & laundry.
Floating timber floors & carpeted bedrooms with neutral colours make this home easy to furnish. Alternatively make an offer on the existing furniture & continue to Holiday let it as, enjoying a nice income return as this home is truly close to everything & low maintenance in every way.
Other features include multi-split system heating & cooling unit in the lounge and dining rooms and an upstairs deck to take in the fresh Island air. This property is set back behind its little sister on a fully fenced block of 258m2 approx, with garden shed and gated carport.
This is a home to grow your young family or enjoy the benefits of a holiday home within 90 minutes of Melbourne. Close proximity to Cowes Golf Club, Silverleaves beach, Ten Pin Bowling and within a few minute's you have everything Cowes has to offer, Cafes, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, Medical centre, main beach and pier. Call now to arrange a personal inspection.

Street Appeal In Seagrove
This recently completed brand new build in the Seagrove Estate, is ready and waiting for you to put your own stamp on.
Situated 800m approx. from the north facing Cowes beach, and approx. 1km from Thompson Avenue shopping precinct, this home is ideally located for either permanent or holiday living. Also only a short drive from all the major tourist attractions, including the Penguin Parade, Nobbies, Koala Conservation Centre and the Grand Prix Circuit.
Ticking all the boxes, the home has been tastefully finished in coastal grey tones throughout, and offers a functional and attractive floor plan.
The layout consists of a master bedroom at the front with ensuite and walk in robe, and 2 further bedrooms both with built in robes, a family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry at the rear of the property. A bright and spacious open plan living, kitchen, dining area is in the centre of the home, with sliding door access out to a covered alfresco.
The kitchen is a real highlight, boasting stone benchtops, island bench, walk in pantry, 900mm oven and cooktop, and dishwasher.
Other features include:-
Double garage, with internal access
Split system heating and cooling
Timber / vinyl plank flooring
Landscaped front garden
Fully fenced rear yard with side access.
First home owners considering this property may also be eligible to benefit from the First Home Owners Grant (FHOG) subject to approval.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Beautiful Beachhouse Bayviews.
Great beach-house with bay views from both levels, relax on the expansive north-facing deck , soak up the sun and the views to Flinders and Red Hill. Open plan living with well appointed kitchen opening to the large deck. Three bedrooms open from the living room and share a family bathroom with separate toilet. Solid timber polished floors throughout.
In a separate area downstairs is a large rumpus, shower room and laundry. There are bay views from the rumpus room.
Set in a large garden in a sought after and quiet nook, this is one to view! Offering expansive decks to the north and south and a fully fenced backyard.
The house has a very good holiday rental history and is currently permanently let to great tenants..
At a glance -
bay views
garden setting
three bedrooms
2 living rooms
extensive decks
split system
Internal area
20mÂ²

address: Villa 236/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
description:
Family friendly holiday villa
An affordable investment opportunity, within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. This superbly maintained Villa consists of 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen. There are 2 outdoor decking areas, the front comes with an outdoor setting, the perfect entertainer. Inside you have reverse cycle split system and gas heating.
This investment opportunity within the Resort will appeal to corporate couples, singles or families looking for a luxurious, relaxing, maintenance free getaway.
The resort offers a cafe/bar, pizzeria, indoor gym, games room, pools, tennis courts, 2 walking trails full of wildlife. Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is less than a 5 minute drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.

Rare wide frontage block !
Quick! This hard to find 18 metre wide frontage block is ready for your dream home design with plenty of room to play with giving you flexibility with your plans.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
With a great orientation and close to the park beach and town all being a short walk away this is the perfect block you have been waiting for.There is even potential for glimpses of the bay from a double storey (STCA).

Seaside Living on a Grand Scale
This opportunity doesn't come around often whether you are looking for a permanent home, holiday house or investment, this property is sure to impress and have every box ticked!
The magnificent near new home is situated on a huge low maintenance parcel of land just under 1000sqm and is only seconds walking distance to the family friendly North facing bay beach.
Downstairs you will find a huge entertaining space/second living zone, three spacious bedrooms all with built in robes, a central family bathroom with double vanity and laundry with through access to the side of the home.
Both downstairs and upstairs features a North facing wrap around deck with sliding doors to create multiple access points for you to enjoy those beautiful balmy nights in summer with indoor/outdoor entertaining.
Upstairs you are greeted with an abundance of natural light, huge living area, master bedroom with walk in robe, ensuite with separate toilet and a private home office or kids playroom built to suit your needs!
The stunning modern kitchen features stone bench tops including a spacious island bench, 900mm gas cook top and oven, double sink and butlers pantry.
Additional features include a large double garage with internal access, split system upstairs and down, privacy and block out blinds, double glazed windows and neutral colours throughout.
Situated in a popular central location with bay views and just 10 minutes' walk to town, this home offers unlimited potential for your every need.
You do not want to miss out on this fantastic opportunity.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Relaxing Ramada Retreat
On offer for sale is a business opportunity consisting of a privately owned, fully furnished 3 bedroom Villa within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island.
This Villa has been managed as a very successful holiday rental for some years.
The owners are prepared to offer, included in the sale, many extras and forward bookings going into 2021 along with the numerous wonderful
reviews received from guests previously holidaying in this Villa, which has been rewarded with a 9.2 rating on booking.com.
An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne, this superbly maintained Villa consists of 3 bedrooms, full ensuite to the main bedroom,
a 2nd bathroom and powder room located between the other 2 bedrooms along with a fully fitted European style laundry.
Bright sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen, with furnished decks to the front and rear of the Villa.
The Resort offers a range of wellness facilities including indoor pools, sauna and hot tub as well as an indoor gym, games room, outdoor pools,
tennis courts, barbeques and playground. There is also a cafÃ©/bar/restaurant within the Resort open for breakfast and dinner.
2 walking trails full of wildlife and handy bike tracks.
Come and take a look and you will not be disappointed.
All of this is less than a 5 minute drive from the Cowes Shopping strip. Phillip Island offers beautiful bays and beaches, famous surf beaches
and of course our very famous penguins.
Call me today to organise a private inspection!

Looking To Extend Your Investment Portfolio?
Located in the heart of Cowes is this single level, three-bedroom home. Only a short walk or drive to the beautiful beaches, cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, primary school, and all of what the township has to offer, the long-term tenanted property is a fantastic investment opportunity.
The home features three bedrooms, one with built in robes, the main bathroom, two separate living zones, one of which could be converted to a fourth bedroom, laundry with additional toilet and open plan kitchen living and dining area.
Other features include; split system heating and cooling, single carport, north facing decking and is 1000m approximately to the beach.
All of this on a fully fenced 456sqm approx. allotment.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.
Please phone 0413 966 420 to book a private or virtual inspection.

Beautiful Abode Perfect for Investment
Feast your eyes and be amazed at this dream family home. It will be hard to resist investing in this four bedroom delight with amazing interiors and located near the beach.
Step inside and walk through the corridor beside the stairs to the minimalistic living area embraced in natural lighting from the mini garden connected to it. Three bedrooms are ideally positioned on the ground floor complemented by a central bathroom with laundry facilities.
Continue upstairs to find the beautiful master bedroom with an ensuite and walk in robe. Be enthralled by the immaculate living/dining space next to the gourmet kitchen area, which comes complete with stainless steel appliances (dishwasher & oven) and four gas cooktops. Enjoy the picturesque views of your expansive backyard from the large desk alfresco on the first floor.
A short walk away from everything that Cowes has to offer, including great cafe's, restaurants and boutique shops, and the beautiful sheltered Cowes bay beach.
This property would make the ideal holiday getaway or a fantastic addition to your investment portfolio.
Please contact the agent to organise a private inspection.

SPECTACULAR BAY VIEWS
This northeast facing apartment is positioned on the top floor of "The Waves" apartment building.
Located at the corner of The Esplanade and Steele Street in cowes.
The Waves apartments are based opposite Cowes beach and Cowes esplanade reserve.
No need to drive with a short 5 minute stroll to Cowes Main Street.

Titled block of land close to Parkland
Part of the Seagrove estate. This level 392m2 (approx.) square metre block is located in the Seagrove Estate and close to parkland and playgrounds.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes north facing bay beaches and walking distance to the main street of Cowes and Schools.

Entertainer's home perfect for the whole family
Proudly positioned high on the hill in a quiet court location, this stunning huge home of approximately 40sq on over a quarter acre block, includes all of the features you could ever wish for.
- 4 oversized bedrooms, all with built in robes
- Master with large en-suite and walk in robe
- 3 living rooms in total, perfect for the kids retreat or games room
- Home theatre and family lounging
- Large decking options both up and downstairs
- 2 bathrooms conveniently located throughout the home
- Generous study
- Modern kitchen expertly designed to keep any master chef happy
- Double ovens, Caesar stone benches, and butlers pantry
- High ceilings through out
- Outdoor room with wood fired pizza oven and in-ground heated pool
- Stone fire pit
- Pedestrian access to rear path - only a short walk to the beach
- Excellent views over the bay, extending from the Mornington Peninsula, to
French island, through to the mountains and beyond.
- Secure double garage with additional parking for boat, camper etc.
- The added comfort of three split systems
All conveniently located only a short walk to the beach, shops, cafes and surrounding parklands. Inspection is a must! Call to arrange your private appointment.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Relaxed Living
This beautifully presented, single level home located in the Shearwater Estate of Cowes is relaxed living at its best. Only a short walk or drive to the Cowes Golf Course, Silverleaves beaches and all of what Cowes has to offer this property is sure to appeal to those looking for a permanent residence, holiday home or investment property.
The home features three generously sized bedrooms, all with built in robes, the enormous master bedroom with double walk in robes and full ensuite, separate living area/study space which could easily be converted to a fourth bedroom, modern main bathroom, and spacious laundry.
At the centre of the home is the light filled, open plan kitchen/living/dining area complete with stainless steel appliances, gas stovetop, electric oven, stone benchtops and huge walk in pantry.
Step out through the sliding plantation shutters and onto the private, north facing, fully covered entertaining area overlooking the established native gardens.
Other features include; double electric garage, plantation shutters throughout, combustion heater, split system heating and cooling, ample storage, garden shed, carpet, tile and vinyl plank flooring throughout.
All of this on a fully fenced, low maintenance 580 sqm approx. allotment.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.
Call 0413 966 420 to book a private or virtual inspection.

This is a home for the whole family to enjoy!
Situated in a tremendous position in the Shearwater estate and diagonally opposite the lake, this modern and single level home is just a short walk to the Silverleaves beach, shops, primary schools and the Cowes Golf Club allowing you to enjoy all the pleasures of a convenient location.
The home itself boasts four bedrooms and three bathrooms with two of the master bedrooms having direct access to their own ensuite.
The light filled and well appointed open plan living/kitchen/dining offers direct access to the undercover North facing entertainment areas that overlook the immaculate and family friendly backyard. There is plenty to do in the fully fenced backyard. It is equipped with a Spring Free trampoline, cubby house that has a rock climbing wall, bird's-nest swing, basketball hoop, chook pen, raised wicking-bed veggie gardens, established fruit trees, and Zip Line. It will be sure to keep the kids busy!
The double car garage offers extra storage space with internal access and rear door to backyard.
With additional features including: study with a stylish barn door that has access to one of the master bedrooms, walk in pantry, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen, cosy wood heater providing year round warmth with a heat transfer system, split system heating and cooling, outdoor shower, professional outdoor wood-fired pizza oven, garden and wood shed, full side access for boat/caravan accommodation and access to the industrial estate via a back gate. Ample space to add a pool or shed.
All of this is set on a lush and generous 1,548sqm approx. professionally landscaped allotment. This truly magnificent residence would be the perfect permanent home or investment opportunity.
This property for Sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

MODERN & CONTEMPORARY - THE PERFECT GETAWAY
This is POSITION POSITION POSITION. The beautiful Cowes north facing beach is located just a short stroll away where you can enjoy long peaceful walks, take a swim and cool down and enjoy a beach day without the drive. The centre of town, with its array of shops, cafes and restaurants, is also within easy walking distance.
As you walk into this unique home you are greeted with the 1st large open living space with a split system and access to the master bedroom with full ensuite facilities and walk in robe. The main 2nd living area is huge with a large country kitchen looking to the backyard this area also offer a second split system for year around comfort. With 3 additional large bedrooms and a central bathroom.

BUILD FOR INLET VIEWS
Located in sought after Shearwater, this level allotment offers you sweeping rural and coastal views from your back yard.
Build to take advantage. Close walking to distance to the Golf Course, Silverleaves Cafe, bushland walking trails and famous Silverleaves beach. Priced to sell. Dont miss this.

Fairway Views Resort
Welcome to Fairway Views, the ultimate address for relaxed resort style living.
With the third and final stage currently under construction and only two townhouses left for sale, now is the time to be part of this gated community .
Secure a contemporary style townhouse overlooking the second and third fairways of the Phillip Island Golf Course.
Both townhouses offer three bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, generous living areas,
well-appointed stylish kitchen, alfresco dining area, double garage and fully landscaped gardens. Designed for luxurious, low maintenance living.
As part of this secure gated complex, residents have access to the swimming pool, tennis court, BBQ hub with full outdoor kitchen and golf putting green.
Located directly opposite Phillip Island golf club and only a short walk to magnificent north facing sandy beaches, this property would make an ideal permanent residence or investment opportunity!
Contact Mike Foenander on 0408 547 677 to secure your investment in this exclusive resort.
Picture yourself here and make the move to start living your dream lifestyle!
** Images for display purposes only**
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Perfect Hideaway/Beach House
The perfect holiday home awaits, with easy access to the Cowes foreshore and boating facilities. The single level home has ample room for a large family, with the perfect man cave to add to the mix. All options are available with the potential for a holiday rental income. With so much potential to put your own personality on, let your creativity run wild!
